sub_topics.title: Mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa (Functions of Oral Literature Forms)
competences: Kumwesha mingilo ya biñambwañambwa (Demonstrate functions of oral literature)

instructional_blocks.hook: Wakyumvwapo kala ino ñambilo? 'Inge ubena kukeba kwenda bukiji, enda bunke, inge ubena kukeba kuya palepa, yayi bavula.'
teacher_steps: Abule bafunda mu tu bipanyi kutanchika mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda kwisamba pa mingilo ya misango yo batanchika
Apitengamo na kolola bafunda babena kwisamba
Pa kipanyi pa kipanyi pafume umo aye kulutwe na kupana mikumbu yo besambapo
learner_steps: Batanchike mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa mu tu bipanyi twabo
Besambe pa mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa yo batanchika
Bamone kuuba amba byo babena kwisamba byaoloka
Umo aye kulutwe na kupana mikumbu yo ba kwisambapo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Biñambwaṅambwa byaimenako mingilo ya nema mu mapunzha mambo byaikala ke kitendekesho kya ku kikizha, kufunjisha ne ku kwatankanya bisho byetu amba bitwajiwe pa lutwe. Mashinda mo bingijila ke kupichila mu: bishimpi, makayo-kayo, nyimbo, bichomeko, bishimi, tulukusha njimi, majashi a ketekelamo bantu abula a kishinka kabiji ne majashi aubiwe kala ayukanyikwa bulongo.

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kwisamba pa mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda kutanchika mingilo yo bafuma na kwisambapo
Akambizhe ufunda umo-umo kufuma pa jibumba ne jibumba kuya na kulondolwela bakwabo kulutwe
learner_steps: Besambe pa mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñabwañambwa
Batanchike mingilo yo bafuma na kwisambapo
Umo pakila jibumba kuya na kulondolwela bakwabo kulutwe
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Misango ya biñambwañambwa itanchikiwe: (a) Misango ya mashimikila (Narrative forms) - Folktails, myths, legends, fables, oral narratives; (b) Misango ya nsansawilo (Poetic forms) - Songs, proverbs, poems, lullabies, dirges; (c) Misango ya makayo-kayo (dramatic form) - Dances, dramatic performances, rituals, storytelling sessions

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kwisamba pa misango ya biñambwañambwa mu tubipanyi tuchetuche
Akambizhe bafunda mu tubipanyi banembe mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Apitangane na kolola bafunda ne kumona kuuba amba bonse ba babena kutolamo lubaji mu mwingilo ye bapewa
Abule umo ufunda pakila jibumba kuya na kupana mikumbu ku lutwe
learner_steps: Besamba pa misango ya biñambwañambwa mu tubipanyi tuchetuche
Banembe mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Bonse batolemo lubaji mu mwingilo wapanyiwa
Umo pakila jibumba aye kulutwe na kupana mikumbu yo besambapo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa: (I) Bishimpi - kufunjisha bantu, kujimuna bantu, kukosesha bantu, kuvulula bantu byo bafwainwa kwikala ne kuuba, kupana maana ku bantu; (II) Makayo-kayo - kusangajika, kufunjisha; (III) Nyimbo - kusangajika bantu, kukosesha bantu, kujimuna bantu; (IV) Bichomeko - bisangajika bantu, bileta ndangulukilo yazhika; (V) Bishimi - kusangajika, kupana mafunjisho; (VI) Tulukusha njimi - kukwasha bafunda kuyuka kwamba, kulanguluka bukiji; (VII) Ma jashi - kuyuka bintu, kuchinya bantu, kujimuna bantu

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kutanyiwa babiji-babiji
Akambizhe bafunda kulondolola mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda kupana mikumbu yo besamba
Olole mikumbu yapana bafunda
learner_steps: Balondolole mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa: (i) Misango ya bulondolozhi (narrative forms); (ii) Misango ya nsansawilo (poetic forms); (iii) Misango ya makayo-kayo (dramatic forms). Yonse misango yanema mukuleta ne kukwasha kulama kisemwa, mpito ne byonse byaitabilwamo bangikazhi ne paimena mashimikila a kisho.

teacher_steps: Abanye bafunda mutu bipanyi tuchetuche ne kwibapa kila kipanyi mitundu ibiji ya kwisambapo
Akambizhe kila kipanyi kwisambapo ne kuswisha pa mingilo ya mitundu ya biñambwañambwa yobapewa
Akambizhe kila jibumba jikale na umo ufunda usakuya kulutwe na kupana mikumbu ya mwingilo ye bakupewa
learner_steps: Bekale mu tubipanyi tuchetuche ne kwisamba pa mwingilo ye bapewa
Besambe ne kuswisha pa mingilo ya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Umo aye kulutwe nakupana mikumbu ya mwingilo ye bapewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo ya biñambwañambwa: Ituvululako kwiyuka atweba beene na beene ne ko twafuma; Kukwatankanya ne kusangajika bantu; Ipimpula ndangulukilo ne mulaka; Kufunjisha. Example kishimi: Maluba wajinga mwanyike walamba bingi - kufunjisha amba muntu wafwainwa kutambula bukwasho inge paji byo bamubula.

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kutongola bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda kwikala mu tubipanyi ne kwisamba pa mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda mu tubipanyi kupana mikumbu yabo kupichila mukutelaula mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
learner_steps: Batongole bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Bekale mu tubipanyi ne kwisamba pa mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Bapane mikumbu yabo kupichichila mu kutelaula mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa: Ilama ne kukikizha bisho; Ifunjisha bantu kukwatankana mu bijiji; Ipana kisangajibwe ne lusekelo; Ipana maana ne lutangjilo; Itundaika mulaka kuya pa lutwe; Ikwasha bantu kulupula bijikila ne milangwe yabo.

vocabulary.definition: Metaphor - ñambilo ya kyambo kimo bibena kulumbulula kintu kyapusanako
Tongue twisters - musango wa kuyukila byo bengijisha lujimi
Euphemism - ñambilo yakoka ibula kushinkamika byambo
Drama - musango wa kuuba kupichila mu ba nkaizhi
Whistle
Riddles - mepuzho akebewa mikumbu ponkapotu
Legend - mashimikila amba pa bya mwekele mu mpito
Epics - mashimikila a amba pa byubilo bya bitonzhi
Lullabies and nursery - nyimbo imbiwa pa kuuba amba mwana alaale
Chants - nyimbo yo babwezha bwezhapo pa kusekelela
Fable - mashimikila epi javula banyama babena ku mwesha byubilo
Folk tales - mashimikila amba javula pa bisho afuma ku nkulo imo

questions: Nemba mingilo ya tulukusha njimi ibiji
Londolola mingilo ya bipanyi bya misango ya biñambwañambwa
Somba lwimbo umo ubena kujimuna bakitwala betumpa mu bisela bya bulaalelale
Londolola lufunjisho luji mu biñambwañambwa byo lupana bukwasho kuubafunda

sub_topics.title: Kulumbulula bingila musango wa biñambwañambwa (Identifying Elements in Oral Literature)
competences: Kusala misango ya biñambwañambwa (Select oral literature forms)

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda basobolole misango ya biñambwañambwa
Akambizhe bafunda balondolole misango ya biñambwañambwa byo basala
Abuule bafunda kwingila babiji babiji ne kulumbulula biñambwañambwa byo basala
learner_steps: Balumbulule misango ya biñambwañambwa byo basobolola
Batoolepo bibiji bibiji mu bubiji bwabo bebilondolole bulongo ne kupana bya ku mwenako
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Misango ya biñambwañambwa: Bisekele - ke nsapawilo nangwa nyimbo ya imbiwanga pa kupandawila; Bishimi 'Fables' - mashimikila ashimikilwanga kwingijisha banyama kwimenako bantu. Examples: Bana ba bantu babela bene ba bantu; Kakoko kaka ka kuka kanyanga kaka.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kuvulukapo misango ya biñambwañambwa
Ebepuzhe balumbulule biñambwañambwa byo bavuluka
Pano ebabanye mu bipanyi banembe misango ya biñambwañambwa byo bakonsha kuvuluka
Umo mu kipanyi aye kulutwe atongole ne kulumbulula misango ya biñambwañambwa byo besambapo mu kipanyi
learner_steps: Batongolepo misango ya biñambwañambwa yo bafuunjile
Mu bipanyi banembe misango ya biñambwañambwa
Umo mu kila kipanyi aye kulutwe na kwamba misango ya biñambwañambwa ne kwibilumbulula
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mitundu ya misango: Makayokayo - makayo obiwa pa ku sombolola kisela kimo; Bishimi - mashimikila amba pa bintu bya mwekejile bantu nangwa bintu; Bishimikizho - ṅambila ingijishiwa mu bu jipuzho pa kupwisha makatazho; Bishimpi - ñambilo yamba pa bukine ne kupaana bukwasho; Nyimbo - imbiwa ne kubulaṅana pa mashimikila a mpito.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafuunda kutanchikapo bimo biñambwañambwa byo bafunjile
Epuzhe bafuunda byo bafwainwa kwingijisha biñambwañambwa byo basobololamo abyo bya konsha kwibakwasha mu bwikalo bwabo
Eba bike mu tu bipanyi besambe pa mashinda engila bulongo na biñambwañambwa mu bwikalo bwabo
Umo mu kipanyi aye kulutwe na kulumbululu bingila biñambwañambwa mu bwikalo bwabo
learner_steps: Balumbulule bingila biñambwañambwa mu bwikalo bwabo
Mu kipanyi kimo kimo umo aye kulutwe na kulumbulula bingila misango ya biñambwañambwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mitundu ya biñambwañambwa ne kulumbulula: Jishimikila ja kisemwa (Folktales) - mashimikila amba javula pa bisho kufuma kunkulo; Kishimi kipi (Fables) - mashimikila epi javula mwikala banyama; Bishimikizho (Myths) - mashimikila a bizhila; Nshimikizho ya buyukanyikwe (Legend) - mashimikila amba pa bya mwekele mu mpito; Nsansawilo ya lepa (Epics); Bishimpi (Proverbs); Ñambilo (Sayings); Nyimbo ya kulajika baana (Lullabies); Bisekele (Chants); Bichomeko (Riddles).

vocabulary.definition: Folktales - mashimikila amba javula pa bisho afuma ku nkulo imo ne kuya ku ikwabo
Fables - mashimikila epi mwikala banyama babena ku mwesha byubilo bijipo na bantu
Myths - mashimikila a bizhila, javujisha bantu baji na luketekelo mu bintu bimo
Legend - mashimikila amba pa bya mwekele mu mpito ya mwesha lwayo lwa bantu
Epics - nsansawilo ya lepa nangwa mashimikila a amba pa byubilo bya bitonzhi
Proverbs - ñamblo imwesha kalango
Sayings - ñambilo ipi imwesha maana
Chants - nyimbo yo babwezha bwezhapo pa kusekelela kwa pusanapusana
Riddles - mepuzho akebewa mikumbu ponkapotu

questions: Batanchike misango ya biñambwañambwa
Ba lumbululepo misango itanu (5) ya biñambwañambwa payo batanchika
Ba nembepo misango ibiji (2) ya biñambwañambwa byo bingila mu bwikalo bwabo
Bachomeke, balete bishimi, bambe tulukusha njimi ne kupana kishimpi kimo kimo

sub_topics.title: Misango ya byanembewa (Forms of Written Literature)
competences: Kusobolola ne kulumbulula misango ya byanembewa (Explore and explain forms of written literature)

instructional_blocks.hook: Juuba jimo, olipa wataine nkalata yakala mu kyola kya bankambo yanji. Byo atangilenga ino nkalata, waumvwine nobe ubena kumvwa jiwi ja bankambo yanji. Ṅanyi Musango wa bya nembewa mu ino nkalata?
teacher_steps: Abanye bafunda mutu bipanyi
Epuzhe bafunda kwisamba ne kutongola misango ya byanembewa
Akambizhe bafunda kunemba misango ya bya nembewa kupichila mu banembeshi ba mutu bipanyi
Ambile bantangi ba bipanyi kutanga byo banemba mukipanyi kimo-kimo
Ateleke ku mikumbu ne kwiyolola
Akambizhe bafunda bonse kunemba misango ya byanembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Misango ya byanembewa: 1. Binembwa ne byambiwa (Prose) - musango umo wa byanembewa kupichila mu ñambilo ne mulakazhilo wa tanchikiwa kwa kubula kubikamo mpoota nangwa malonzhi. Wingijishiwa mu bya kusomba (ma novel, mashimikila epi) nangwa bya kuubala ne kusomba (bibabo, ponda bwanji, ponda boobe). 2. Nsansawilo - musango umo ulupula bijikila, milanguluko ne bya kusomba kwingijisha mpota nangwa malozhi ne biñambañamba. 3. Makayo-kayo - musango wa biñambwanembwa waimena pa kuuba kupichila mu ba nkaizhi kabiji ne kukilapo.

teacher_steps: Epushe bafunda misango ya byanembewa
Akambizhe bafunda kwisamba pa bulumbuluzhi bwa misango ya byanembewa
Akambizhe bafunda kupana mikumbu yabo
Olole mikumbu ya bafunda
Ambile bafunda kulemba bulumbuluzhi bwa misango ya byanembewa
learner_steps: Besambe pa bulumbuluzhi bwa misango ya byanembewa
Bapane mikumbu ne kwiyolola na mufunjishi
Banembe bulumbuluzhi bwa misango ya byanembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Bulumbuluzhi: Binembewa ne byambiwa (Prose) - musango wa byanembewa wa tanchikiwa kwa kubula kubikamo mpoota. Nsansawilo - musango ulupula bijikila, milanguluko ne bya kusomba kwingijisha mpota. Makayo-kayo - musango waimena pa kuuba kupichila mu ba nkaizhi kabiji ne kukilapo.

vocabulary.definition: Prose - musango umo wa byanembewa kupichila mu ñambilo ne mulakazhilo wa tanchikiwa kwa kubula kubikamo mpoota
Poetry - musango umo ulupula bijikila, milanguluko ne bya kusomba kwingijisha mpota
Drama - musango wa biñambwanembwa waimena pa kuuba kupichila mu ba nkaizhi

questions: Lemba bulumbuluzhi bwa makayo-kayo, nsansawilo ne binembwa
Lemba nsansawilo pa mutwe wa kyobe-kyobe

sub_topics.title: Mabanyo a misango ya bya nembewa (Categories of Written Literature Forms)
competences: Kwabanya mwaila mashimikila a nembewa (Categorize written narratives)

teacher_steps: Abanye bafunda mu bipungu bya basatu-basatu
Akambizhe bafunda basale misango ya mitundu ya byanembewa
Epuzhe bafunda ku chocheka pa misango ya mitundu ya byanembewa
Akambizhe banembeshi ba mu tubipanyi kupana masawakya
learner_steps: Basale pa misango ya mitundu ya byanembewa
Bachocheke pa misango ya mitundu ya byanembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mitundu ya byanembewa: 1. Prose (byanembewa ne byaambiwa): Novel (buuku wa mashimikila), Short stories (mashimikila epi), Essays (kibabo), Autobiography (ponda boobe), Biography (ponda bwanji). 2. Poetry (Nsansawilo): Lyrical poetry, Narrative poetry, Epic poetry, Tragedy, Comedy, Historical drama. 3. Drama (Makayo-kayo): Tragedy (nkumisho), Comedy (nsekesho), Historical drama (makayo-kayo a mpito).

teacher_steps: Anengezhe biṅambaṅamba bya pusana-pusana bya lamata ku byanembewa
Akambizhe bafunda kusobololamo biṅambaṅamba byatala ku bya nembewa
Epuzhe bafunda kutelaula bya nembewa bya ambiwa peulu
learner_steps: Basobolole biṅambaṅamba byatala ku bya nembewa
Batelaule bya nembewa bya ambiwa peulu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Ma novelo - ae ke mashimikila akusomba nangwa akine anembewa mu kusaka kusekesha bantu. Tu ma novelo - ke mashimikila akusomba aamba pa kine nangwa bya bubela. Mpito ya bwikalo bwa muntu - uno ke mutundu wa mashimikila wa amba pa bwikalo bwa mwiine muntu.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kupana bimwesho bya mitundu ya misango ya bya nembewa
Epuzhe bafunda kuchocheka pa mitundu ya misango ya bya nembewa umo umo ne byo bya abanyiwa
Abakambizhe bekale mu bipanyi bibiji be kyombeshe ku pichila mu kumona basa kutongola misango ya mitundu ya bya nembewa
learner_steps: Bapane bimwesho bya misango ya bya nembewa
Bachocheke pa misango ne mitundu ya bya nembewa
Mu bipanyi bibiji be kyombeshe kupichila mu kupana misango ya mitundu ya bya nembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Bimwesho bya mitundu: Prose - byanembewa ne byaambiwa; Poetry - nsansawilo (lyrical, narrative, epic, tragedy, comedy); Drama - makayo-kayo (nkumisha, nsekesho, historical drama).

vocabulary.definition: Buuku wa mashimikila - mashimikila akusomba nangwa akine
Mashimikila epi - mashimikila akusomba aamba pa kine
Kibabo - nsombelo
Ponda boobe - jishimikila janemba nembi pa pabwikalo bwanji mwine
Ponda bwanji - jishimikila janemba nembi pa bwikalo bwa muntu mukwabo

questions: Mwayila milanguluko yenu londolola kyambo kya byanembewa
Tanchika misango ya mitundu ya byanembewa yonse ne kwi ilumbulula

sub_topics.title: Mpashañenyo ne Lupusano luji pakachi ka Biñambwanembwa (Similarities and Differences in Written Literature)
competences: Kwesakanya ne kupusanya mitundu ya Byanembewa (Compare and contrast types of written literature)

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafuunda kwingila mu bipanyi
Epuzhe bafuunda kutelaula misango ya mabuku obatangapo kala
Akambizhe bafuunda kutanchika byanembewa bikwabo
Akambizhe bafuunda kutanchika mpashañenyo iji mu Byanembewa
Aleke bafunda bapane mikumbu yabo
Olole mikumbu
learner_steps: Batelaule mitundu ya mabuku obatangapo kala
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mpashañenyo iji mu byanembewa: Novelo ne tumashimikila twipi - monse mwanembwa mafunjisho alamata ku byubilo bya bantu, monse mutanwa bankaizhi, monse mutanwa ñambilo yazhika. Byakusomba ne byabulwa kusombwa - monse mutanwa mapuzha, bimye, monse mwanembwa mafunjisho. Nsekesho ne nkumisho - monse mutanwa bankaizhi, monse mwanembwa lukolwa. Ponda bobe ne ponda bwami - monse mwanembwa mafunjisho.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafuunda kwingila babiji-babiji
Akambizhe bafuunda kutanchika lupusano luji mu misango ya byanembewa
Aleke bafunda bapane mikumbu
Olole mikumbu yapanyiwa
learner_steps: Kutanchika lupusano luji mu misango ya byanembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Lupusano: Novelo ne tumashimikila - novelo mutanwa jishimikla jalepa pakuuba tumashimikila mutanwa jishikikila jipi. Byakusomba ne byabulwa kusombwa - byakusomba mwanembwa mashimikila akufwanyikizha pakuuba byabulwa kusombwa mwanembwa mashimikila a kine. Nsekesho ne nkumisho - komedi isekesha pakuuba tilajidi ileta bulanda. Ponda bobe ne ponda bwami - ponda bwami ke jishimikila janemba nembi pa pabwikalo bwanji mwine pakuuba ponda bobe ke jishimikila janemba nembi pa bwikalo bwa muntu mukwabo.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kwingila mu bipanyi
Akambizhe bafunda kunemba bishite bibena kutakaika misango ya byanembewa
Aleke bafunda bapane mikumbu yabo
Olole mikumbu
learner_steps: Banembe bishinte bibena kutakaika misango ya byanembewa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Buneme buji mu misango: Novelo ne tumashimikila tupwisha kitendwe kubetutanga. Byakusomba ne byabulwa kusombwa mutanwa mashimikila muji lufunjisho. Nsekesho ne nkumisho bineena byubilo byatama. Ponda bobe ne ponda bwami, mwanembwa mingilo yawama ya mwina jishimikila.

vocabulary.definition: Similarities - byo byapashañana
Differences - byo byapusana
Tragedy - jishimikila jileta bulanda
Comedy - jishimikila jisekesha

questions: Lumbulula lupusano luji pakachi ka ponda bobe ne ponda bwami
Mu ñanyi mashinda mwipashisha nsekesho (comedy) ne nkumisho (tragedy)
Nembapo mashinda asatu mwapusena nsekesho ne nkumisho

sub_topics.title: Mingilo ya byanembewa (Functions of Written Literature)
competences: Mwesha mingilo ya byanembewa (Demonstrate functions of written literature)

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda mwatala kyambo kya byanembewa
Epuzhe bafunda balondolole bingila biñambañamba byo atongola
Epuzhe bafunda kutanchika mingilo ya byanembewa
learner_steps: Ba lumbulule mwatala kyambo kya byanembewa
Balondolole bingila biñambañamba biji na mufunjishi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Byanembwa ke byonse byatala mu byanembewa mu mabuuku. Bitanyiwa mu ma pepela a byambo, biji mu mabuuku, mashimikila anembewa.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda bapusanye byanembewa ne bya bulwa kunembewa
Akambizhe bafunda besambe pa mingilo ya byanembewa
Ape bafunda kipepala pa nembewa mikuku ya byambo ibiji kya mwesha buneme bwa mu byanembewa
learner_steps: Banembe mikuku ya byaambo ibiji kufuma pa kipepala kibapa mufunjishi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo ya byanembewa: Kuleta kisangajimbwe; Lufunjisho; Bya kuvulukilako mu bwikalo; Bya bwikalo bwetu; Bya kisemwa ne bwikalo; Kulama mpito ne ñano.

teacher_steps: Abule bafunda balumbulule kyambo kya byanembewa mu mashinda avula
Ambile bafunda kutolamo bukwasho ne buneme buji mu bulumbuluzhi bo bapana
Akambizhe bafunda kwichocheka pa mikumbu yapanyiwa
Ateleke ne kuta maana ku bibena kwingila bafunda
Asambakanye mikumbu ne kwiyolola
learner_steps: Balumbulule kyambo kya byanembewa mu mashinda avula
Batolemo lutundaiko ne buneme buji mu bulumbuluzhi bo bapana
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo yonse: Kuleta kisangajimbwe; Lufunjisho; Bya kuvulukilako mu bwikalo; Bya bwikalo bwetu; Bya kisemwa ne bwikalo; Kulama mpito ne ñano.

vocabulary.definition: Biography - byambo byalamata ku mpito ya buumi bwa muntu byanemba muntu mukwabo
Autobiography - byambo byalamata ku mpito ya buumi bwa muntu byanemba muntu mwine mwina mpito

questions: Lumbulula mwatala kyambo kya byanembewa
Lumbulula byo wafunda pa byanemwa

topics.topic_title: BYAMBO-SEKA NE BYOMBESHI BYA BIÑAMBWANEMBWA (Literary Terms and Devices)

sub_topics.title: Mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa (Types of Literary Terms and Devices)
competences: Kwisamba pa mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi (Discuss types of literary terms and devices)
Kusala mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi (Select types of literary terms and devices)
Kulumbulula mwatala mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi (Explain types of literary terms and devices)

instructional_blocks.hook: Kutanga jishimikila jakoka ne kubula kwikalamo bumi, jibena kubula kuleta bikope mu maana obe, kijikila ne kisangajimbwe.
teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kulumbulula mwatala byambo-seka ne byombeshi byalamata ku biñambwanembwa
Akambizhe bafunda mu tubipanyi kwisamba pa byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Ambile bafunda kupana minsambo yabo ne kutelaula byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Olole mikumbu yafuma ku bafunda
Akambizhe bafunda kunemba byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
learner_steps: Balumbulule mwatala byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Besambe pa byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Bapane byo besamba kupichila mu kutelaula byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa apa bino ne kwibinemba
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Byambo-seka ne byombeshi: 1. Ngesakenyo (metaphor) - ñambilo ya kyambo kimo bibena kulumbulula kintu kyapusanako; 2. Bimwekesho (imagery) - ñambilo yesekesha kuletela muntu nguvwino, ntelekelo, mweno; 3. Nkinji (irony) - lupusano pakachi ka kyaketekelwa ne kyokya kibena kubiwa; 4. Mbengakenyo (euphemism) - ñambilo yakoka ibula kushinkamika byambo; 5. Lupashañano (onomatopoeia) - kyambo kingijishiwa kulumbulula mvumino ya kintu; 6. Myendeleko (satire) - kwambilamo nangwa kulembelamo kwingijisha nkiji; 7. Mfwanyikizho (personification) - kutongola banyama ne kwibifwanyikizha ku bantu; 8. Nkakasho/kintente (hyperbole) - ñambilo ingijishiwa mu kuubaisha nangwa kusuntula byambo; 9. Kintunwa (symbolism) - kwingijisha kwa bintu mu kumwesha milanguluko; 10. Konsonansi (consonance) - ku bweluluka kwa mvumino ya tulume; 11. Asonansi (assonance) - kubweluluka kwa mvumino yamafumu; 12. Alegoli (allegory); 13. Mpashañenyo (simile); 14. Nzhokelo ya ňambilo (figures of speech); 15. Alitalesheni (alliteration).

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kutelaula byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Abanye bafunda mu bipanyi
Apane tubikachi ku bafunda pa nembwa byambo-seka ne byombeshi
Akambizhe bafunda kwisamba ne kulumbulula mo byatala
Akambizhe bafunda kupana mikumbu
Ateleke, kusambakanya mikumbu ya mu bipanyi ne kwiyolola
learner_steps: Batelaule byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa
Mu bipanyi besambe pa byambo-seka ne byombeshi
Batambule tu bikachi twa nengezha mufunjishi
Balumbulule mwatala bino byambo-seka ne byombeshi
Bapane mikumbu kupichila mu bantangi ba bipanyi
Bolole mikumbu yo bapana mu bipanyi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Bya kumwenako: 1. Mwela wanogotelenga mu bichi - Mfwanyikizho; 2. Uji na lubilo nobe lwa kalulu - Mpashanenyo; 3. Watomejilenga kapanda mu mukola wa lusa - Ngesakenyo; 4. Na kubulapo javujisha - Nkakasho.

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kutongola byambo-seka ne byombeshi
Abanye bafunda mu bipanyi
Akambizhe bafunda kwisamba pa mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya kumwenako
Atundaike bafunda bonse kutolamo lubaji mu miisambo
learner_steps: Besambe pa mitundu ya byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya kumweneko
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Examples: 1. Ba katolo inge bazhingila, lupili-pili - Ngesakenyo; 2. Wazhoka kyulu - Mbengakenyo; 3. Umvwe nazhingila nafwainwa kumina muntu - Nkakasho; 4. Kyembe wendetu nobe kibata - Mpashañenyo.

vocabulary.definition: Metaphor - ñambilo ya kyambo kimo bibena kulumbulula kintu kyapusanako na byambo bine
Imagery - ñambilo yesekesha kuletela muntu nguvwino, ntelekelo, mweno ne nguvwino ya bwema
Irony - lupusano pakachi ka kyaketekelwa ne kyokya kibena kubiwa
Euphemism - ñambilo imo yakoka ibula kushinkamika byambo kuchina kukozhañana
Onomatopoeia - kyambo kingijishiwa kulumbulula nangwa kusombolola mvumino ya kintu
Satire - kwambilamo nangwa kulembelamo kwingijisha nkiji kupichila mukuseka muntu
Personification - kutongola banyama nangwa bintu ne kwibifwanyikizha ku bantu
Hyperbole - ñambilo ingijishiwa mu kuubaisha nangwa kusuntula byambo pa kumwesha kunema kwa kintu
Symbolism - kwingijisha kwa bintu, misombelo ne bintutu bikwabo mu kumwesha milanguluko
Consonance - ñambilo ingijishiwa kupichila mu ku bweluluka kwa mvumino ya tulume
Assonance - ñambilo ingijishiwa kupichila mukubweluluka kwa mvumino yamafumu
Simile - ñambilo ingijishiwa mu kupashañanya bintu bibiji kwingijisha 'nobe'
Figures of speech

questions: Lumbulula ne kupana kya kumwenako ku kyambo kya mpashañenyo
Nanchi mfwanyikizho yoika? Pana bya kumwenako bibiji
Londolola lupusano luji pakachi ka asonansi ne konsonansi
Lumbulula mwatala bifyamiko
Kwingijisha byambo-seka ne byombeshi bya biñambwanembwa kwanemena ka?

sub_topics.title: Ndumbulwilo ya bankaizhi (Character Description)
competences: Kulumbulula mitundu ya bankaizhi (Explain types of characters)
Kusabaula ndumbuluzhi ya bankaizhi (Identify character descriptions)
Kusantaula mingilo ya bankaizhi (Analyze character functions)

instructional_blocks.hook: Muntu washimikizha jishimikila jabulwa bankaizhi. Walanguluka amba jino jishimikila jafwainwa kulondoloka anyi?
teacher_steps: Abike bafunda mu bipanyi
Akambizhe bafunda kulondolola bankaizhi
Aleke bafunda batange mikumbu yabo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Nkaizhi ke muntu nangwa nyama watelwa mu jishimikila. Mitundu: Kaimbi (nkaizhi mukatampe), Ndenguluzhi (nkaizhi wipachika na kaimbi), Mutemwekaimbi (nkaizhi ubula kwipachika na kaimbi), Nkaizhi pimpulwa (nkaizhi upimpulwa byubilo), Nkaizhi mbulwapimpulwa (nkaizhi ubulwa kupimpulwa byubilo).

teacher_steps: Akambizha bafunda kulumbulula mitundu ya bankaizhi
Epuzha bafunda kunemba bishinte byalamata ku mitundu ya bankaizhi
Akambizhe bafunda kutanga mikumbu yaabo
Olole mikumbu
learner_steps: Banembe bishite byalamata ku mitundu ya bankaizhi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mitundu ya bankaizhi: Kaimbi - nkaizhi mukatampe paimena jishimikila; Ndenguluzhi - nkaizhi wipachika na nkaimbi; Nkaizhi pimpulwa - wafwainwa kutendeka jishimikila na byubilo bimo; Nkaizhi mbulwapimpulwa - ubula kupimpula byubilo mu jishimikila jonse.

teacher_steps: Anengezhe manovelo a kikaonde
Aleke bafuunda batange kibaba panembewa bankaizhi
Akambizhe bafunda kubula kutanga manovelo apusanapusan
Akambizhe bafunda kulondolola mitundu ya bankaizhi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Byubilo bya bankaizhi: Kaimbi uji na muchima wamunkosha, ongola michima yabakwabo bankaizhi; Ndenguluzhi ulengulula byubilo bya kaimbi; Mutemwekaimbi utakaika byubilo bya kaimbi.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafuunda kwingijila mu bipanyi
Epuzhe bafuunda kusantaula mingilo ya bankaizhi yo bayuka
Ete munembeshi wa kila kipanyi apane mikumbu
learner_steps: Basantaule mingilo ya bankaizhi yo bayuka
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo ya bankaizhi: Bankaizhi bakatampe - wakutundaika jishimikila; Bankaizhi ba bacheche - wakutundaika bankaizhi-kata, wakutangijila ngya lutwe ya jiishimikila.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda kwikala mu bipanyi
Akambizhe bafunda kusantaula mingilo ya bankaizhi
Aleka bafunda bapane mikumbu yabo
Olole mikumbu
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Mingilo: Kaimbi - ye wayamo nkuwa mu jishimikila; Ndenguluzhi - ulengulula kaimbi; Bankaizhi ba kibiji - bakwasha mingilo ya kwa kaimbi.

vocabulary.definition: Character - muntu nangwa nyama watelwa mu jishimikila
Protagonist - nkaizhi mukatampe paimena jishimikila
Antagonist - nkaizhi wipachika na nkaimbi
Supporting character - nkaizhi ubula kwipachika na kaimbi
Round character - nkaizhi upimpulwa byubilo
Flat character - nkaizhi ubulwa kupimpulwa

questions: Nembapo lupusano lusatu luji pa kachi ka: (a) Kaimbi ne ndenguluzhi; (b) Nkaizhi-kata ne nkaizhi-kache

sub_topics.title: LUKOOLA (Plot)
competences: Kulondolola biyukilo bya lukoola (Describe plot elements)
Kusantaula biyukilo bya lukoola mu jishimikila (Analyze plot elements in narratives)

teacher_steps: Abanye bafunda mu tubipanyi tuji na bafunda batanu mu kila kipanyi
Kipanyi kitanshi besambe pa ntendekelo ne ntuntukilo ya jishimikila
Kipanyi kya bubiji bafunda besambe pa kankomo ne nkunkulukilo ya jishimikila
Kipanyi kya busatu bafunda besambe pa nkunkulukilo ya jishimikila ne kupwishaṅanya
Kila kipanyi bafunda basale wa kwibemenako nangwa munembeshi
Epuzhe bafunda kwisamba pa byambo bya panyiwa
Akambizhe banembeshi kuleta masawakya
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Biyukilo bya lukoola: 1. Ntendekelo (Exposition) - ntendekelo ya jishimikila amo mutanyiwa kimye ne mpunzha; 2. Ntuntukilo ya jishimikila (Rising Action) - ndonda ya bibena kubiwa abya bitunga lukatazho; 3. Kankomo (Climax) - kifulo palukila kimye nangwa penepene pa katezha bimye; 4. Nkunkulukilo ya jishimikila (Falling Action) - byubiwa panyuma ya kankomo; 5. Kupwishañanya (Resolution) - mpelo ya jishimikila, malwañano apwa.

teacher_steps: Apane kipepala po anemba jishimikila ku bafunda ki bakwashe ku sobolola lukoola
Eba kambizhe kutanga jino jishimikila
Akambizhe bafunda kusobolola bino biyukilo bya lukoola mu jishimikila
Abanye bafunda mu tu bipanyi tuche-tuche
Akambizhe munembeshi apane masawakya
learner_steps: Basobolole biyukilo bya lukoola mu jishimikila
Munembeshi apane sawakya ku bafunda bakwabo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Example jishimikila: Nsongwakazhi wa jizhina ja kimote wikala mu kamuzhi kacheche. Wataine jisabi mu mukola kwesakanya na byo akebelenga mwine. Kimote wakebelenga kwikala muntu wanonka kabiji waya nkuwa, waishile watana amba bwikalo bwanji bwakatataka kechi bwajinga bwaesakana pamo nabyo alangulukilenga ine. Waishile wafunda buneme ne munema wa kisemi ne bulunda.

teacher_steps: Epuzhe bafunda kutongaula tuyukilo twa lukoola mu jishimikila jaambiwa
Akambizhe bafunda kwikala mu tubipanyi
Akambizhe bafunda baji mu bipanyi kusantaula tuyukilo tuji mu lukoola
Akambizhe banembeshi bamu mabumba bapane mikumbu
Mufunjishi olole bafunda na mikumbu ya panyiwa
learner_steps: Batongaule tuyukilo twa lukoola mu jishimikila jaambiwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Bishina bya lukoola: Ntendekelo - ntendekelo ya jishimikila; Ntuntukilo - byubiwa panyuma ya ntendekelo; Kankomo - kifulo pa lukila; Nkunkulukilo - byubiwa panyuma ya kankomo; Kupwishañanya - mpelo ya malwañano.

vocabulary.definition: Exposition - ntendekelo ya jishimikila amo mutanyiwa kimye ne mpunzha
Rising Action - ndonda ya bibena kubiwa abya bitunga lukatazho
Climax - kifulo palukila kimye nangwa penepene pa katezha bimye
Falling Action - byubiwa panyuma ya kankomo ka bintu
Resolution - mpelo ya jishimikila, malwañano apwa
Denouement - final outcome

questions: Lumbulula mwatala bino bishina bya lukoola: (i) Nkunkulukilo ya jishimikila; (ii) Kankomo; (iii) Kupwishañanya; (iv) Ntendekelo

sub_topics.title: Tanda-bimye (Setting)
competences: Kusabaula biyukilo bya tanda-bimye (Identify setting elements)
Kusabaula tanda-bimye mu jishimikila (Identify setting in narratives)
Kupesa-pesa tanda-bimye mu jishimikila (Elaborate on setting)

teacher_steps: Abule bafunda balumbulule kyambo kya tanda -bimye
Ambile bafunda kutolamo bukwasho ne buneme buji mu tanda- bimye
Akambizhe bafunda kwichocheka pa tanda- bimye
Akambizhe bafunda ku sambakanya mikumbu ne kwiyolola
learner_steps: Batolemo lutundaiko ne buneme buji mu tanda -bimye
Bechocheke pa mikumbu ya solokamo mu kulumbulula tanda- bimye
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Tanda-bimye: ke kyambo kyo tubena kwingijisha mu kulumbulula mwatala kimye, mpunzha/nyaunda mwamwekejile jishimikila jiji jonse. Bimye ne mpunzha/nyaunda, byo byonka biyukilo bitukwashako kuyuka kwa mwekejile jishimikila. Kechi byonkabyotu ine, tanda-bimye ileta buyukwe bwa bwalaukwe (mood), kisho ne mwatala kisemwa.

teacher_steps: Akambizhe bafunda batongole buyukwe bwa tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
Akambizhe bafunda basabaule buyuke bwa tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
Kambizha bafunda kwichocheka pa tanda- bimye mu jishimikila jo ashimikizha
learner_steps: Batongole kyambo kya tanda -bimye mu jishimikila
Basabaule bintu biji mu tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Biyukilo bya tanda-bimye: Kimye (time), Mpunzha (place), Moba (period), Kisho ne kisemwa (culture and customs), Nyaunda (location), Bwikalo bwa bantu (social conditions).

teacher_steps: Abule bafunda basande-sande buyuke bwa Tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
Akambizhe bafunda bapese-pese buyuke bwa tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
Akambizha bafunda kolola mukumbu yabo pa tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
learner_steps: Basande-sande kyambo kya tanda -bimye mu jishimikila
Bapese-pese bintu biji mu tanda- bimye mu jishimikila
Bolole mikumbu yatala pa tanda -bimye mu jishimikila
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Buneme: Tanda-bimye bitukwasha kuyuka kimye, moba ne mpunzha/nyaunda mwa mwekejile jishimikila. Kitukwashako kuyuka kisho ne kisemwa kya bantu.

vocabulary.definition: Setting - kyambo kyo tubena kwingijisha mu kulumbulula mwatala kimye, mpunzha mwamwekejile jishimikila
Time - when the story takes place
Place/Location - where the story takes place
Period - the era or time period
Culture and customs of the people in the story
Social conditions

questions: Sabaula byonse biji mu tanda-bimye mu jishimikila
